sn22.63:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn22.63:1.3: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.63:1.4: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.63:2.1: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajanasi”ti?
sn22.63:2.10: Imassa khvaham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami”ti.
sn22.63:3.2: Sadhu kho tvam, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajanasi.
sn22.63:3.3: Rupam kho, bhikkhu, upadiyamano baddho marassa;
sn22.63:3.10: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attho datthabbo”ti.
sn22.63:4.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
sn22.63:4.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
sn22.63:4.3: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
sn22.63:4.4: Annataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahatam ahositi.
